* * *

Announcing our partnership with American Excavating Corp

We build custom

# Data Platforms

for your business

We analyze needs, unify your data (SaaS, DBs) via MCP, and build secure, custom AI agents & solutions that integrate seamlessly with your existing systems.

[Contact us](https://thinair.dev/#contact)

![Wave background](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fblack-white-waves.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Wave background](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fblack-white-waves.png&w=3840&q=75)

## How We Operate

We build future-ready custom AI solutions using advanced frameworks like the Model Context Protocol (MCP), helping you navigate the AI landscape with expert guidance. We don't just implement technologyâ€”we become your strategic partner to operationalize AI within your existing processes, ensuring you lead into the next era.

01

![Discovery Process](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fsnowglobe-visual-v2-3D.png&w=828&q=75)

### Discover

We start by deeply understanding your operations, challenges, data resources, and objectives to identify opportunities for cutting-edge AI integration.

- In-depth business analysis
- Data assessment for AI readiness
- Workflow observation
- Pain point identification

02

![Propose Solutions](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Flightbulb-book-visual-3D.png&w=640&q=75)

### Propose Solutions

Based on discovery insights, we develop tailored AI solutions built on future-proof architectures like the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

- Future-ready AI solution concepts (MCP-enabled)
- Integration architecture planning
- ROI projections & timelines
- Technical & business requirements

03

![Implementation](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fship-bottle-visual-3D.png&w=828&q=75)

### Build & Ship

We bring solutions to life, integrating seamlessly with your systems using scalable, forward-thinking technology.

- Custom development & integration
- Rigorous testing & refinement
- Team training & knowledge transfer
- Ongoing support & future-proofing

### Melt away the complexity of AI with Thinair

While competitors struggle with evolving AI, you'll move forward confidently. Thinair builds custom AI solutions on future-ready frameworks like the Model Context Protocol (MCP), becoming your strategic partner. We operationalize AI, implement necessary solutions, and transfer knowledge to maintain your edge. Stop wasting resources or falling behind. Thinair is your direct path to sustainable, AI-powered results.

Accelerate Your AI Journey

![Melting away complexity](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fmelting-complexity.png&w=1080&q=75)

## Unified Intelligence Platform

Our Uix platform automatically connects to your existing data sources, analyzes their structure (introspects), and transforms them into a single, intelligent interface. Perfect for SaaS companies simplifying customer data integration and businesses unifying internal systems for AI.

![API Service](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FAPI-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![API Service](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FAPI-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![SQL Database](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FSQL-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![SQL Database](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FSQL-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![UIX Platform](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fuix-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![React Applications](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Freact-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

React Hook

![MCP Icon](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fmcp-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

Model Context

Protocol

![Universal Endpoint](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fplug-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

Universal Endpoint

The Uix platform acts as a central intelligence hub. It automatically analyzes (introspects) your SQL databases and APIs (using JSON schemas where available, generated from API documentation where not) to generate a unified GraphQL schema. This allows your applicationsâ€”whether internal tools or customer-facing SaaS featuresâ€”to access all data through one consistent, secure endpoint (via our Model Context Protocol - MCP), eliminating integration complexity while respecting existing security.

### Experience Unified Intelligence

Uix helps businesses unlock the potential of their data. If you run a SaaS platform, drastically cut down customer data integration time. If you're enhancing internal operations, unify your disparate systems effortlessly. By automatically understanding your data structures, Uix brings everything together.

1

#### Prepare Your Data Securely

We automatically analyze (introspect) your existing databases (or your customers' databases via secure connection) to make them AI-ready while ensuring security rules are respected.

2

#### Connect Systems for NLQ

Link internal or external software (APIs) and data sources. Uix automatically understands API schemas to create a unified GraphQL layer (via MCP), safely translating natural language questions into precise data requests.

3

#### One Hub for Accurate Answers

Get reliable answers from all connected data (your own or your customers') by asking questions naturally, maintaining consistent security across the board.

Explore our platform

### Secure by Design

Security is built-in. Uix automatically generates a structured GraphQL layer from connected data sources. When you ask a question, our Model Context Protocol (MCP) uses this layer to structure the request \*before\* accessing data, preventing unsafe operations.

#### Controlled & Validated Queries

Our structured GraphQL approach, generated automatically by analyzing data structures (introspection), only permits valid requests, offering strong protection.

#### Respects Existing Permissions

Your existing database security rules (or those of your connected customer) are automatically recognized (introspected) and enforced.

## Get Started

Ready to transform your business with AI? Tell us about your project and we'll help you get started.

## Get in Touch

Tell us about your project, and we'll help you leverage AI for your business.

results.title: Thinair | Accurate NLQ & AI Solutions via Model Context Protocol (MCP)
results.markdown:
# Privacy Policy & Terms of Service

## Privacy Policy

Last Updated: 4/29/2025

### Information We Collect

When you opt in to our SMS messaging service, we collect your phone number and any information you provide in your messages to us. We may also collect data about message delivery and your interactions with our messages.

### How We Use Your Information

We use your information to:

- Send you the SMS messages you've requested
- Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
- Improve our services and develop new features
- Comply with legal obligations

### Data Storage and Security

We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information. Your data is stored securely and only retained for as long as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.

### Your Rights

You have the right to:

- Opt out of SMS messages at any time by texting "STOP"
- Request information about what data we hold about you
- Request deletion of your data subject to legal requirements

## SMS Terms of Service

ThinAir SMS Notifications

1. By opting in to our SMS service, you agree to receive informational and transactional messages about your account, services, and important updates.
2. **You can cancel the SMS service at any time. Just text "STOP" to the short code. After you send the SMS message "STOP" to us, we will send you an SMS message to confirm that you have been unsubscribed. After this, you will no longer receive SMS messages from us. If you want to join again, just sign up as you did the first time and we will start sending SMS messages to you again.**
3. If you are experiencing issues with the messaging program you can reply with the keyword HELP for more assistance, or you can get help directly at [info@thinair.dev](mailto:info@thinair.dev)
4. Carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages.

Last Updated: 4/29/2025

results.markdown:
![ThinAir AI](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fthinair-ai-visual-3D.png&w=750&q=75)

## Our Customer Success Stories

See how we've helped forward-thinking businesses transform their operations with custom AI solutions that deliver measurable results.

![Wave background](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fblack-white-waves.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Wave background](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fblack-white-waves.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Albany Advanced Digital Imaging](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Falbany-advanced-logo-3D.png&w=640&q=75)

### Albany Advanced Digital Imaging

We developed a comprehensive digital solution for this scientific imaging provider, including a complete website rebuild and custom cloud platform capable of handling terabytes of high-resolution slide scans. Our AI-driven development approach transformed the president's vision into precise website copy, while our custom image viewer technology enables researchers to examine microscopic details with exceptional clarity.

Healthcare AIScientific ImagingCloud Platform

![Technology 1](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Faws-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 2](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fpostgres-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 3](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Freact-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

### American Excavating

We transformed this construction company's operations by building an integrated field-to-office data platform that revolutionized their bidding accuracy and equipment management. Our custom AI solution analyzes field data against historical performance to generate high-confidence bids that directly improve profit margins. The companion fleet management system enables QR-code triggered maintenance requests from the field to cloud, replacing inefficient phone chains with streamlined digital workflows and AI-powered maintenance scheduling.

Construction TechAI BiddingFleet Management

![Technology 1](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Faws-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 2](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fpostgres-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 3](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Freact-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 4](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fgraphql-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![American Excavating](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Famerican-excavating-logo-3D.png&w=640&q=75)

![Blueprint Custom Apparel](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fblueprint-logo-3D.png&w=640&q=75)

### Blueprint Custom Apparel

We revolutionized this corporate apparel company's workflow by automating their most time-consuming processes. Our AI solution leverages fine-tuned image generation models to instantly create product mockups, while simultaneously generating accurate quotes based on their historical pricing data. We also unified their fragmented supplier ecosystem by aggregating APIs from SSActivewear and Sanmar into a single interface, enabling real-time inventory checks and automated product image retrieval during quote creation. This transformed their previously disjointed workflow into a seamless system that eliminated hundreds of weekly manual hours.

AI Image GenerationAutomated QuotesWorkflow Optimization

![Technology 1](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Faws-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 2](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fpostgres-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 3](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Freact-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

![Technology 4](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fgraphql-icon-3D.png&w=96&q=75)

results.title: Thinair | Accurate NLQ & AI Solutions via Model Context Protocol (MCP)
results.markdown:
# Meet Uix â€” Unified Intelligence for Modern Applications

The platform that automatically unifies your data, enabling accurate Natural Language Query (NLQ) and seamless front-end experiences to redefine application building.

![API Service](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FAPI-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![API Service](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FAPI-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![SQL Database](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FSQL-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![SQL Database](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2FSQL-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![UIX Platform](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fuix-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

![React Applications](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Freact-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

React Hook

![MCP Icon](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fmcp-icon-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

Model Context

Protocol

![Universal Endpoint](https://thinair.dev/_next/image?url=%2Fplug-icon-v2-3D.png&w=3840&q=75)

Universal Endpoint

## Accurate Answers From All Your Data

### Instant GraphQL Layer for NLQ

Point Uix at your database or APIs. It automatically analyzes their structure (introspects) to generate a powerful GraphQL API. This structured layer is key for translating natural language questions into precise data queries.

### Secure AI Data Access

Eliminate the risks of AI generating raw SQL. Uix uses its automatically generated, validated GraphQL schema (enabled by our Model Context Protocol - MCP) to ensure AI requests stay within safe boundaries, respecting existing security.

### Unified Data for Accurate NLQ

Connect disparate APIs and databases through one endpoint. Ask questions in plain English and get reliable, structured answers drawn directly from all connected sourcesâ€”unlike vector searches that approximate.

## Why Developers Love Uix

01

### Auto-Generated Front-End Code

Get typed queries, mutations, and subscriptions automatically derived from your unified data layer.

02

### AI-Powered Development

Ideal for AI developmentâ€”let assistants generate front-end queries while Uix securely handles data access, accurate NLQ translation, and backend complexity.

03

### Zod Integration

Convert GraphQL queries to Zod schemas, enabling AI to output data that perfectly matches your validation requirements.

04

### Zero DevOps Headaches

Hosted or self-deployed with a CLI commandâ€”focus on features, not infrastructure wrestling.

## Why Uix Outshines Everything Else

### Beyond Hasura & Supabase

Where others stop at basic GraphQL reflection, Uix provides automatic schema generation optimized for accurate NLQ, AI-ready integration, and comprehensive front-end tooling.

### Superior to Traditional ORMs

Unlike Prisma or Drizzle, Uix combines type-safe data access with an automatically generated, unified GraphQL layer ready for NLQ and front-end integration.

### More Universal Than TRPC

Enjoy type-safety benefits with the universal adoption of GraphQL, plus automated data unification and NLQ capabilities TRPC doesn't offer.

## Made For Everyone Who Builds Modern Apps

### SaaS Providers

Drastically reduce customer onboarding time by automating data integration. Use Uix to securely connect to customer databases/APIs and enable powerful NLQ features in your product.

### Enterprises & Startups

Unify internal systems (databases, APIs, SaaS tools) effortlessly. Build internal tools, dashboards, and AI applications with accurate NLQ over all your business data.

### AI-First Developers

Focus on AI logicâ€”let Uix manage secure NLQ translation, schema constraints, data fetching, and backend infrastructure across any connected data source.

## Ready to build smarter, faster, and safer?

Unlock accurate Natural Language Query and secure AI integration with Uix. Automatically unify data, streamline development, and join the future.

Request Access
